messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Service Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: There has been an escape at our latest top secret prison site today. we have estimated that they are upon lavaland the planet you are currently orbiting if you capture him and return him to us we will add 5 million spacecredits to your budget and give the person who captured him another 1 million in personal credits

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we were able to reactive his GPS implant it should be avaible on all channels as engima

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we are paying you to go down there stun and cuff and fuck the shit out of him and bring him to us

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Vault.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello crew, this is Peter Petrograd speaking. I am your acting Captain, so good luck!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Powerful Level 50 Magical Entity onboard, follow standard protocol. A """Inspector""" is coming.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to the fact he literally burned all of science and we don't want any omre damage done we have transfered credits and a shuttle to the station eta 2 minutes

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a whoop of energy draining parasites have stampeded into the place with all those juicy wires.
